targets.sql: select last(sys_cpu_cores) as cpus from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(sys_total_memory)/(1024*1024*1024) from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_cpu_percent)  from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_memory_percent * sys_total_memory / 100) as taox, last(sys_total_memory) as total from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_uptime)as seconds from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select count(*) - 1 as restart_times from (select distinct(process_id) from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to);
select _wstart as ts, avg(process_cpu_percent) as cpu_usage from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, last(process_memory_percent * sys_total_memory) / 100 / 1024 / 1024 as memory_usage, last(sys_total_memory) / 1024 / 1024 as memory_total from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, last(running_tasks) as running_tasks from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(VALUE, 0);
select _wstart as ts, sum(failed_tasks) as failed_tasks from log.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(VALUE, 0);
select _wstart as ts, sum(completed_tasks) as completed_tasks from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(VALUE, 0);
select last(sys_cpu_cores) as cpus from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(sys_total_memory)/(1024*1024*1024) from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_uptime)as seconds from  $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_cpu_percent)  from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

select last(process_memory_percent * sys_total_memory / 100) as agent, last(sys_total_memory) as total from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

select _wstart as ts, avg(process_cpu_percent) as cpu_usage  from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, last(process_memory_percent * sys_total_memory / 100 / 1024 / 1024) as memory_usage, last(sys_total_memory / 1024 / 1024) as memory_total from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select task_id, task_name, last(`consumers`) as `consumers`, last(execute_time) as execute_time, last(total_execute_time) as total_execute_time  from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name order by task_id desc

select last(_ts) as update_time, task_id, `topic`, `vgroup`, last(`offset`) as `offset`, last(`latest`) as `latest`  from $database.taosx_task_progress where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, `topic`, `vgroup` order by task_id, `topic`, `vgroup` desc

select _rowts as ts, task_id as id, task_name as name, derivative(messages, 1s, 1) as mps from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'TDengine3' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id order by task_id, task_name

select _rowts as ts, task_id as id, task_name as name, derivative(messages_bytes, 1s, 1) as bps from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'TDengine3' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id order by task_id, task_name

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  last(total_write_raw_fails) - first(total_write_raw_fails) as write_raw_fails from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'TDengine3' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select task_id, task_name, last(execute_time) as execute_time, last(written_rows) as written_rows, last(total_execute_time) as total_execute_time, last(total_written_rows) as total_written_rows  from $database.taosx_task_tdengine2 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name order by task_id desc

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (max(total_written_rows) - min(total_written_rows)) * 1000 / (max(total_execute_time) - min(total_execute_time)) as rows_per_second from $database.taosx_task_tdengine2 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'TDengine2' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (max(total_written_points) - min(total_written_points)) * 1000 / (max(total_execute_time) - min(total_execute_time)) as points_per_second from $database.taosx_task_tdengine2 where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'TDengine2' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select task_id, task_name, last(execute_time) as execute_time, last(written_rows) as written_rows, last(total_execute_time) as total_execute_time, last(total_written_rows) as total_written_rows  from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name order by task_id desc

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (max(total_written_rows) - min(total_written_rows)) * 1000 / (max(total_execute_time) - min(total_execute_time)) as rows_per_second from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (max(total_written_points) - min(total_written_points)) * 1000 / (max(total_execute_time) - min(total_execute_time)) as points_per_second from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (last(total_processed_batches) - first(total_processed_batches)) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (last(total_received_batches) - first(total_received_batches)) as received_batches from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, (last(total_failed_sqls) - first(total_failed_sqls)) as failed_sqls from $database.taosx_task_pibackfill where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, avg(process_cpu_percent) as process_cpu_percent from $database.taosx_connector where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ds_name = 'pibackfill' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'PIBackFill' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, avg(process_cpu_percent) as process_cpu_percent from $database.taosx_connector where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ds_name = 'opcda' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'OPCDA' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, avg(process_memory_percent) as process_memory_percent from $database.taosx_connector where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ds_name = 'opcda' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'OPCDA' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, avg(process_disk_read_bytes) as process_disk_read_bytes from $database.taosx_connector where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ds_name = 'opcda' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'OPCDA' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id, avg(process_disk_written_bytes) as process_disk_written_bytes from $database.taosx_connector where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ds_name = 'opcda' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'OPCDA' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select task_id, task_name, last(execute_time) as execute_time, last(written_rows) as written_rows, last(total_execute_time) as total_execute_time, last(total_written_rows) as total_written_rows, last(mqtt_fetched_messages) as fetched_messages, last(processed_messages) as processed_messages  from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name order by task_id desc

select timetruncate(_rowts, 1s) as ts, derivative(processed_messages, $interval, 1) as mps, concat('processed ', task_id, '-',  task_name) as task_id from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name

select timetruncate(_rowts, 1s) as ts, derivative(mqtt_fetched_messages, $interval, 1) as mps, concat('fetched ', task_id, '-',  task_name) as task_id from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name

select _wend, round((last(processed_messages) - min(processed_messages)) / (last(mqtt_fetched_messages) - min(mqtt_fetched_messages)), 2) as written_fetched_rate, task_id as id, task_name as name from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where  taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to   partition by task_id, task_name interval($interval) sliding(1s)

select timetruncate(_rowts, 1s) as ts, derivative(mqtt_fetched_messages, 1s, 1) as mps, concat('mps: ', task_id, '-',  task_name) as task_id from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name

select timetruncate(_rowts, 1s) as ts, derivative(mqtt_received_bytes, 1s, 1) as rate, concat('bps: ', task_id, '-',  task_name) as task_id from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id, task_name

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (last(total_processed_batches) - first(total_processed_batches)) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'MQTT' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  (last(total_received_batches) - first(total_received_batches)) as received_batches from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task' or 'MQTT' not in (${datasource:sqlstring})) and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

panels.description: Database insertion rows and points per second

list.definition: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null ORDER BY CASE WHEN name = 'log' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, name;
list.label: Log from
list.name: database
list.query: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null ORDER BY CASE WHEN name = 'log' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, name;

list.definition: select concat(agent_id, '!', agent_id, '-' ,agent_name) from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.label: Agent
list.name: agent_id
list.query: select concat(agent_id, '!', agent_id, '-' ,agent_name) from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to order by agent_id desc

list.definition: SELECT 'TDengine2' AS datasource  UNION  SELECT 'TDengine3' UNION  SELECT 'Influxdb' UNION  SELECT 'OpenTSDB' UNION  SELECT 'OPCUA' UNION  SELECT 'OPCDA'  UNION  SELECT 'PI' UNION  SELECT 'PIBackFill' UNION  SELECT 'CSV'UNION  SELECT 'MQTT' UNION SELECT 'AvevaHistorian' UNION  SELECT 'Kafka' order by datasource
list.label: DataSource
list.name: datasource
list.query: SELECT 'TDengine2' AS datasource  UNION  SELECT 'TDengine3' UNION  SELECT 'Influxdb' UNION  SELECT 'OpenTSDB' UNION  SELECT 'OPCUA' UNION  SELECT 'OPCDA'  UNION  SELECT 'PI' UNION  SELECT 'PIBackFill' UNION  SELECT 'CSV'UNION  SELECT 'MQTT' UNION SELECT 'AvevaHistorian' UNION  SELECT 'Kafka' order by datasource

list.definition: select distinct concat(task_id, '!', task_id, '-' ,task_name) from $database.taosx_task_$datasource where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.label: Task
list.name: task
list.query: select distinct concat(task_id, '!', task_id, '-' ,task_name) from $database.taosx_task_$datasource where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
